review_text: I needed this for my third Wilton's class, and it was cheaper on Amazon.com than in the store. It's part of the curriculum, so it's required. Whether it is good for skill development or not, I take my classes very seriously, and get alot out of them. I also believe in checking prices everywhere for the class supplies. Amazon was cheapest, and I received it in 2 days, free shipping, Amazon prime.
product_name: Wilton Decorating Cakes Book (The Wilton school)
